CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: In terms of PCE , approximately 56% was improved with 2.5% , compared with the device in which the PC61BM was applied as an acceptor.

Let's think step by step.

1. PCE: Photovoltaic Conversion Efficiency

So, the Material Name entities in the paragraph are:

1. PCE (Photovoltaic Conversion Efficiency)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

The only Material Name entity in the paragraph is:

1. PCE (Photovoltaic Conversion Efficiency)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: In terms of PCE , approximately 56% was improved with 2.5% , compared with the device in which the PC61BM was applied as an acceptor.

Let's think step by step.

1. PCE: Photovoltaic conversion efficiency
2. Approximately 56%: Value of the PCE before improvement
3. 2.5%: Amount by which PCE was improved
4. Device: Unspecified device where PC61BM was not applied as an acceptor
5. PC61BM: Unspecified substance or component applied as an acceptor in the device.

So, the property values in the paragraph are "Approximately 56%" (the initial PCE value), "2.5%" (the improvement in PCE), and the unstated PCE value of the device where PC61BM was not applied.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. Approximately 56%: Initial value of the material property (PCE)
2. 2.5%: Value of the improvement in the material property (PCE)

So, the relevant entities in the paragraph are "Approximately 56%" and "2.5%", as they are the only entities that clearly refer to the values of the material property (PCE) mentioned in the paragraph.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
